narration: Did you know the electric guitar was invented by accident? In 1931, jazz musician George Beauchamp strapped a telephone pickup onto his guitar, creating a new sound! This accidental innovation set the stage for rock and roll. Talk about a happy accident!
videoPrompt: Scene 1: Close-up of a vintage 1930s jazz club on stage, focusing on a musician experimenting with a guitar and old telephone parts. Scene 2: Transform the scene to show the evolution of the guitar sound with vibrant electric effects. Scene 3: Show a lively concert scene, emphasizing the guitar's central role in modern music. Photorealistic with warm sepia tones transitioning to vibrant neons.
ytDesc:
Discover how a jazz musician's experiment led to the birth of the electric guitar!
